com.tomtom.speedtools.akka

Class TypedActorContext<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tomtom.speedtools.akka.TypedActorContext<T>

  • public class TypedActorContext<T>
extends Object
    Facade of the actor system to be used by typed actors. All Akka functionality to be used from an actor is exposed through this class. It also facilitates unit testing, since no static methods no longer have (and should) be called. A typed actor facade can be injected automatically by TypedActorFactory.

      • actorOf

        @Nonnull
public <T,Impl extends T> T actorOf(@Nonnull
                                             Class<T> interfaceClass,
                                             @Nonnull
                                             Class<Impl> implementationClass,
                                             @Nonnull
                                             Object... explicitParameters)
        Creates an untyped actor of given class. The class should have a constructor with parameters that match given explicitParameters. If the constructor has additional parameters and it has the Inject annotation, these parameters will be injected.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Interface.
        Impl - Implementation.
        Parameters:
        interfaceClass - Interface of the untyped actor to create.
        implementationClass - Class of the untyped actor to create.
        explicitParameters - Parameters to be passed to the constructor.
        Returns:
        Actor reference.

      • actorOf

        @Nonnull
public <T,Impl extends T> T actorOf(@Nonnull
                                             String name,
                                             @Nonnull
                                             Class<T> interfaceClass,
                                             @Nonnull
                                             Class<Impl> implementationClass,
                                             @Nonnull
                                             Object... explicitParameters)
        Creates an untyped actor of given class with a given name. The class should have a constructor with parameters that match given explicitParameters. If the constructor has additional parameters and it has the Inject annotation, these parameters will be injected.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Interface.
        Impl - Implementation.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the created actor.
        interfaceClass - Interface of the untyped actor to create.
        implementationClass - Class of the untyped actor to create.
        explicitParameters - Parameters to be passed to the constructor.
        Returns:
        Actor reference.

      • scheduleOnce

        @Nonnull
public akka.actor.Cancellable scheduleOnce(@Nonnull
                                                    scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration duration,
                                                    @Nonnull
                                                    Runnable runnable)
        Schedules the runnable to be run after duration. The runnable is run one. Note that the runnable is NOT run in the context of the actor. Always use self() to interact with the actor!
        Parameters:
        duration - Amount of time to wait before runnable is called.
        runnable - Code to run.
        Returns:
        A Cancellable object for the runnable.

      • schedule

        @Nonnull
public akka.actor.Cancellable schedule(@Nonnull
                                                scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration initialDelay,
                                                @Nonnull
                                                scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration interval,
                                                @Nonnull
                                                Runnable runnable)
        Schedules the runnable to be run at a given interval. There is an initial delay before the first time. Note that the runnable is NOT run in the context of the actor. Always use self() to interact with the actor!
        Parameters:
        initialDelay - Initial delay to wait.
        interval - Amount of time to wait before runnable is called.
        runnable - Code to run.
        Returns:
        A Cancellable object for the runnable.

      • actorForRefTerminated

        public boolean actorForRefTerminated(@Nonnull
                                     Object proxy)
        Returns true if the Actor corresponding to the supplied TypedActor proxy is terminated.
        Parameters:
        proxy - The TypedActor.
        Returns:
        true if the corresponding Actor is terminated.
